src:
FOTO: Pahorja ujeli z mlado lepotico na državni proslavi
Luka Pečar Pahor se je s svojo izbranko udeležil državne proslave.
06 Nov 2019, 07:28 by N. Č.



Borut Pahor in Tanja Pečar sta na svojega sina zagotovo ponosna. FOTO: Blaž Samec, Delo



Luka Pečar Pahor in Tisa Lozej. FOTO: Mediaspeed



Državna proslava ob dnevu reformacije. FOTO: Mediaspeed


Nekaj dni je že minilo od državne proslave ob dnevu reformacije v Cankarjevem domu. Linhartova dvorana je bila polna povabljenih gostov, med katerimi ni manjkalo najpomembnejših predstavnikov politične oblasti.


Državna proslava ob dnevu reformacije. FOTO: Mediaspeed

Kamera je v svoj objektiv ujela tudi predsednikovega sina Luko Pečarja Pahorja, ki postaja vse vidnejši in aktivnejši član stranke SD. Kot je pisala Mladina, so ga v poslanski skupini SD pred kratkim zaposlili prek študentskega servisa, da bi pomagal predvsem pri pripravi različnih vsebin iz zunanje politike in politik EU, je namreč študent mednarodnih odnosov.


Luka Pečar Pahor in Tisa Lozej. FOTO: Mediaspeed

Luka se je s svojo izbranko Tiso Lozej udeležil državne proslave ob dnevu reformacije. Medtem ko sta njegova mati in oče sedela v prvi vrsti med povabljenci v skrbno izbranih oblačilih, si je on privoščil nekoliko več modne svobode in razkuštrane lase. V nekem trenutku se nam je zazdelo, da se je oblekel v nekdanje obleke svojega očeta ali pa da mu je pred proslavo zmanjkalo časa, da bi se bolje uredil. A ob njem je bila za protiutež njegova postavna Tisa, ki je v črnini žarela od mladostniške energije. Tisa pred kamero nima težav, saj je občasno tudi fotomodel, na instagramu pa najraje objavlja svoje portrete, fotografije sodobne evropske arhitekture in utrinke iz skupnega življenja s predsednikovim sinom.
text:
PHOTO: Capture Pahor with Young Beauty at National Celebration
Luka Pečar Pahor and his chosen ones attended the national celebration.
06 Nov 2019, 07:28 by N. Č.



Borut Pahor and Tanja Pecar are definitely proud of their son. PHOTO: Blaz Samec, Delo



Luka Pecar Pahor and Tisa Lozej. PHOTO: Mediaspeed



National Reformation Day celebration. PHOTO: Mediaspeed


A few days have passed since the national celebration on the day of the Reformation at the Cankarjev dom. The Linhart Hall was full of invited guests, one of whom lacked the most important representatives of political power.


National Reformation Day celebration. PHOTO: Mediaspeed

The camera also captured the president's son, Luka Pecar Pahor, as an increasingly prominent and active member of the SD party. As Mladina wrote, he was recently recruited through a student service group in the SD parliamentary group to assist in the preparation of various contents from the EU's foreign and foreign policy, namely he is a student of international relations.


Luka Pecar Pahor and Tisa Lozej. PHOTO: Mediaspeed

Luka and his chosen son Tisa Lozej attended a national celebration on the day of the Reformation. While his mother and father sat first and foremost among the invitees in carefully selected clothes, he afforded a little more fashion freedom and unbuttoned hair. At one point, it seemed to us that he had dressed in his father's former dresses, or that he was running out of time before the celebration to get better. But next to him was his figure Tisa, who was glowing with youthful energy. Tisa has no problems in front of the camera, as she is occasionally a photomodel, and on Instagram she prefers to publish her portraits, photographs of contemporary European architecture and moments from living together with the President's son.
